https://tmrev.io/movie/29972-24 City 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qoVSdZNIWsKzK1gLl0bGFFLGOBg.jpg 24 City chronicles the dramatic closing of a once-prosperous state-owned factory in Chengdu, southwest China and its conversion into a sprawling luxury apartment complex. Three generations, eight characters : old workers, factory executives and yuppies, their stories melt into the History of China. 24 City
